snippet: The authorities in southern China have seized about 8,000 rolls of toilet paper containing unflattering images of Hong Kong’s chief executive, according to an official of the small political party that placed the order.
abstract: Chinese authorities seize thousands of rolls of toilet paper and packages of tissues containing images of Hong Kong's pro-Beijing chief executive Leung Chun-ying.
lead_paragraph: The authorities in southern China have seized about 8,000 rolls of toilet paper containing unflattering images of Hong Kong’s chief executive, according to an official of the small political party that placed the order.

headline.main: China Purges a Party’s Rolls (and Tissues)
headline.print_headline: China Purges a Party’s Rolls (and Tissues)
